question: Which organizations negotiated data analytics deals after recent changes in their leadership teams?

subtasks.task: Identify recent changes in leadership teams of organizations. [CompanyLeadershipExcerpt]
Find data analytics deals negotiated by those organizations. [CompanyDealMaster]
